column5: Hey Yall, Well, after a long break from fishing, I needed to put a little food on the table. I went to Gullrock with a good friend of mine and picked up some nice Walleyes and Saugers. The weather was just beautiful, we chipped out a few holes that Sundays anglers had drilled the previous day. We picked up our limits within an hour. I fried my fillets up for diner with some home made fries... MMMMM Fish and Chips.... Fishin' hot hot hot.... [email protected] Mista W
